ValidationRule.description: If the value provided within the "Does Install Involve Replacement?" field = Yes, you must provide a value within Replacement 1. If the value = No, then Replacement 1, 2, & 3 values must be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( FS_Does_Install_Involve_a_Replacement__c , 'YES') , ISBLANK( FS_Replacement_1__c )) , true, false), AND(ISPICKVAL( FS_Does_Install_Involve_a_Replacement__c , 'NO'), OR(NOT(ISBLANK(FS_Replacement_1__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(FS_Replacement_2__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(FS_Replacement_3__c))))) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, $Label.Exclude_User))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the value provided within the "Does Install Involve Replacement?" field = Yes, you must provide a value within Replacement 1. If the value = No, then Replacement 1, 2, & 3 values must be blank.
